extension_description.message: Unofficial FIP Radio player. One-click playback, automatic scrobbling and 'now playing' informations display.

lastfm_auth_ok_info.message: You are now able to scrobble what you listen on FIP Radio.

lastfm_window_close.message: You can now safely close this window.

lfm_bug_label.message: Temporarily disabled while an annoying scrobbling bug is fixed.
